Question
========

Solve the following system.

$$\begin{align}
`r py$lex1`&=`r b[1]`\\
`r py$lex2`&=`r b[2]`
\end{align}$$


Solution
========

$$\begin{align}
x&=`r x[1]`\\
y&=`r x[2]`
\end{align}$$
